Typedef Documentation

typedef struct WAV_Writer_s WAV_Writer

Write WAV formatted audio to a file.

Author:
Phil Burk, Copyright 1997 Mobileer, PROPRIETARY and CONFIDENTIAL This structure contains information needed when writing a WAV file image.

Function Documentation

long Audio_WAV_CloseWriter ( WAV_Writer *  writer  ) 

Close WAV file.

Update chunk sizes so it can be read by audio applications.

long Audio_WAV_OpenWriter ( WAV_Writer *  writer,
int  frameRate,
int  samplesPerFrame 
)

Open named file and write WAV header to the file.

The header includes the DATA chunk type and size. Returns number of bytes written to file or negative error code.

long Audio_WAV_WriteShorts ( WAV_Writer *  writer,
short *  samples,
int  numSamples

Write to the data chunk portion of a WAV file.

Returns bytes written or negative error code.
